Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: DATA356
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement for an old 2megapixel camera.  The pictures it took were horrible.  Indoors, outdoors, flash on, flash off...  all the pictures were blurry or grainy.  I returned it to Best Buy where I had paid 29.99 for it.  Surprised that Best Buy would sell such junk.  Save your money or spend a little more for a better camera.

Reviews.Title: SUCKS SO BAD, EVEN AS A GIFT FOR A 3-YR-OLD!!
Reviews.Author: Lotus flower mama "Lotus flower mama"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 3-yr-old daughter for Christmas, since she's always taking my more-expensive Canon, and I figured this would keep her away from it. Well, you'd think 5.1 MP would be pretty damn good, since it was only a few years ago that 4 MP was the most expensive (okay, maybe 9-10 years ago, but still...the pictures were GOOD!). But, as the previous reviewer wrote, no matter where or how you take pictures, they're GRAINY, and the flash is WAY too bright, washing everything out! It looks like you took the pictures with a REALLY old instant camera, maybe way back from the  1960s or something! Yes, you can see what's in the pictures, but they still really SUCK! MAYBE a decent toy for a 3-yr-old, since I doubt she cares about picture quality, but, first, I'm surprised a Vivitar camera SUCKS this bad, and  second, her Fisher-Price kids' camera actually takes pictures that are pretty much the SAME quality as this!! DON'T BUY UNLESS YOU'RE GIVING THIS AS A CHEAP TOY TO A KID!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Travel camera
Reviews.Author: Michele McKenzie-Jones
Reviews.Content: The price was perfect for my 14 year old. This was supposed to be a camera for her while she travels this summer but, she took this camera to the prom and with brand new batteries in it the camera died!

Reviews.Title: Horrible camera!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Majeres
Reviews.Content: This camera isn't worth 5 dollars! The pscreen is very cloudy and impossible to see what you are even taking a picture of!

Reviews.Title: Not even good as a paper weight
Reviews.Author: Andy Liberatoscioli
Reviews.Content: The pictures this camera takes are just awful. It reminds me of the very first cell phone cameras that came out 10 years ago. You're better off getting a penicl and paper and sketching what ever you wanted a picture of.
